label: 陀羅尼, 総持
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: dhāraṇī (Sk.). Verbal formulae which, as with mantra (J. shingon) and vidyā (明呪 J. myōju) , are believed to evoke powers upon proper enunciation. The dhāraṇī tend to be longer than mantra.
